entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1 except plus 4 over western sections. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind light except southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 over southwestern sections early this afternoon. High minus 1 except plus 4 over western sections. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 except minus 7 over western sections. POP 30%
